title: U.S. Is Closing Kyiv Embassy, Relocating Diplomatic Operations to Western Ukraine
sub_head: Secretary of State Antony Blinken describes relocation as a temporary move to protect embassy staff
body:
WASHINGTONâ€”The U.S. is closing its embassy in the Ukrainian capital of Kyiv and relocating operations 340 miles west to Lviv near the Polish border, as allies warn that an attack by Russian forces on Ukraine may be imminent.
Secretary of State Antony Blinken described the relocation as a temporary move to protect embassy staff.
